org.openimaj.audio.generation

Class Synthesizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.generation.Synthesizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>, Instrument

    public class Synthesizer
extends AudioStream
implements Instrument
    Really really basic synthesizer. Useful for doing tests by running the synth as an audio source through filters or whatever.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
